name: FunIsh
description:
A game made for the VGLab 01, a short game dev exercice by At0mium. The goal was to create a Fun Button that does stuff. At least that is what I understood.

WARNING: LOUD SOUNDS AND INTENSE SCREENSHAKE

Play with a mouse or touch.

  • Made live in a few hours, by @DrGeraud
  • Music by @Kilirane
